statements: SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE production_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE end_date > '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE production_quantity >= 100;
SELECT start_date, end_date, product_name FROM production_schedules ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedules
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-03-31'
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM production_schedules
SELECT production_id, start_date, product_name FROM production_schedules WHERE end_date < '2023-12-31'
SELECT * FROM production_schedules
SELECT product_name, production_quantity, production_date FROM production_schedules ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_name, production_quantity FROM production_schedules WHERE production_quantity > 1000
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM shift_assignments WHERE shift_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT * FROM production_schedules WHERE production_quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM production_schedules WHERE product_name LIKE 'P%' AND production_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, product_name FROM production_schedules WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS total_products, AVG(production_quantity) AS avg_quantity FROM production_schedules GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_quantity > 50;

SELECT sa.employee_id, ps.product_name, sa.shift_date FROM shift_assignments sa JOIN production_schedules ps ON sa.shift_date = ps.production_date WHERE sa.shift_type = 'Morning' ORDER BY sa.shift_date ASC, ps.product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM production_schedules;
SELECT product_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM workforce WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM shift_assignments WHERE shift_start_time >= '2022-01-01' AND shift_end_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM workforce WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM workforce WHERE department = 'Accounting' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shifts FROM shift_assignments;
SELECT product_name, start_time, end_time FROM production_schedules WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_time ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM workforce JOIN shift_assignments ON workforce.employee_id = shift_assignments.employee_id WHERE department = 'Operations';
SELECT * FROM Workers
SELECT worker_id, worker_name, department FROM Workers WHERE job_title='Manager'
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, production_date FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_qty > 1000
SELECT supervisor_name, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM ShiftAssignments

SELECT ShiftSchedule.worker_id, Workers.worker_name, Workers.department, ShiftSchedule.schedule_id, ProductionSchedules.product_name FROM ShiftSchedule JOIN Workers ON ShiftSchedule.worker_id = Workers.worker_id JOIN ProductionSchedules ON ShiftSchedule.schedule_id = ProductionSchedules.schedule_id
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_date = '2022-08-10';
SELECT product_name, production_qty FROM ProductionSchedules WHERE production_qty > 100 ORDER BY production_qty DESC;
SELECT worker_name, department, job_title FROM Workers WHERE department = 'Production' AND job_title = 'Operator';
SELECT supervisor_name, shift_date, shift_start_time, shift_end_time FROM ShiftAssignments ORDER BY shift_date ASC;
SELECT ws.worker_id, ws.schedule_id, ss.worker_id, ss.schedule_id FROM Workers ws JOIN ShiftSchedule ss ON ws.worker_id = ss.worker_id ORDER BY ws.worker_id ASC, ws.schedule_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT worker_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM ShiftAssignment WHERE worker_name = 'John' AND (shift_start > '2022-01-01' OR shift_end < '2022-12-31');
SELECT machine_name, status FROM Machine WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ProductionSchedule ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT product_name, order_quantity FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE order_quantity > 100;
SELECT schedule_id, product_name, start_time, end_time FROM ProductionSchedule WHERE start_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT worker_name, shift_start, shift_end FROM ShiftAssignment WHERE shift_end < NOW();
SELECT worker_name, department FROM Worker INNER JOIN Department ON Worker.department = Department.department_id ORDER BY worker_name ASC;
